summary: A group of random people are invited to a screening of a mysterious movie, only to find themselves trapped in the theater with ravenous demons.
cast: Urbano Barberini|Natasha Hovey|Karl Zinny|Fiore Argento|Paola Cozzo|Fabiola Toledo|Nicoletta Elmi|Stelio Candelli|Nicole Tessier|Geretta Geretta|Bobby Rhodes|Guido Baldi|Bettina Ciampolini|Giuseppe Mauro Cruciano|Sally Day|Eliana Miglio|Jasmine Maimone|Marcello Modugno|Peter Pitsch|Lino Salemme|Enrica Maria Scrivano|Alex Serra|Michele Soavi|Claudio Spadaro|Sami Habib Ahmed|Lamberto Bava|Victor Beard|Russel Case|Paolo Corazzi|Giovanni Frezza|Claudio Insegno|Sergio Stivaletti|Goffredo Unger|Emanuela Zicosky
title: Demons
